summary: "Alice in Wonderland" is a 2010 fantasy adventure film directed by Tim Burton. It's based on Lewis Carroll's book and stars Mia Wasikowska as Alice, who falls down a rabbit hole and returns to Wonderland. With help from the Mad Hatter (Johnny Depp), Alice fights against the Red Queen to restore the White Queen's throne. The film was a big hit, making over $1 billion and winning awards for its art and costumes. It also inspired more live-action fairy tale movies. A sequel came out in 2016.
title: Alice in Wonderland (2010 film)
